author: Stewart_Julie
title: Ideally Located
text:
Lovely friendly hotel with wonderful staff.
We stayed in the Master Garden Room, which had the largest King Bed ever (and very comfy to boot) complete with its own roof top garden. And because our stay was more than three nights, included was Free Airport Transfer (which was an added bonus).
Barbara’s ‘bacon & eggs’ were a must for breakfast and a great starter to a day’s sight-seeing.
‘Happy Hour’ where buffet snacks are provided with a drink purchase was a great way to meet with other guests from all over the world and discuss your touring experiences - be that in Rome itself or elsewhere.
Room Tip: Master Garden Room well worth it! See more room tips
